description: The smirk on Adam Killian’s face at the beginning of this encounter tells us everything we need to know: he’s flirting with the handsome newcomer Devin Franco online, and it’s all because he wants to fuck him… bad. Devin, who prefers the bottom bunk, loves being with men bigger and harrier than him, so when Adam gets naked to show off his body, Devin is instantly ready to go. Dick sucking and ass eating warms Devin up for the main course, which is Adam getting him on all fours and sodomizing the twink deep in the ass!
title: Devin Franco Makes His Debut With Adam Killian
